  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String type, int size, int price, int multChanged)
      Constructor of a weapon
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item (weapon)
      description - The description of the item (weapon)
      type - The type of the item (weapon)
      size - How much inventory space the item (weapon) will take
      price - The original price of the item (weapon)
      multChanged - How much the weapon can aid the ship by increasing the attack multiplier of the ship
